entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
